original_solution_mapping.L1: There are 50 / 2 = <<50/2=25>>25 people in economy class.
original_solution_mapping.L2: There are 25 people in business first and business class, so there are 25 - 3 = <<25-3=22>>22 in business class.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Thus, there are 30 - 22 = <<30-22=8>>8 unoccupied seats in business class.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7181.
    Returns: the number of unoccupied seats in business class.
    """
    # L1
    economy_class_capacity = 50 # 50 in economy class seating
    economy_class_occupancy_divisor = 2 # economy class is half full
    economy_class_people = economy_class_capacity / economy_class_occupancy_divisor

    # L2
    first_class_people = 3 # only three people on the flight have first class seats
    business_class_people = economy_class_people - first_class_people

    # L3
    business_class_capacity = 30 # 30 in business class
    unoccupied_business_seats = business_class_capacity - business_class_people

    # FA
    answer = unoccupied_business_seats
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: There are {economy_class_capacity} / {economy_class_occupancy_divisor} = <<{economy_class_capacity}/{economy_class_occupancy_divisor}={economy_class_people}>>{economy_class_people} people in economy class.

There are {economy_class_people} people in business first and business class, so there are {economy_class_people} - {first_class_people} = <<{economy_class_people}-{first_class_people}={business_class_people}>>{business_class_people} in business class.

Thus, there are {business_class_capacity} - {business_class_people} = <<{business_class_capacity}-{business_class_people}={unoccupied_business_seats}>>{unoccupied_business_seats} unoccupied seats in business class.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: There are 50 / 2 = <<50/2=25>>25 people in economy class.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: There are 25 people in business first and business class, so there are 25 - 2 = <<25-2=23>>23 in business class.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Thus, there are 30 - 23 = <<30-23=7>>7 unoccupied seats in business class.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'economy_class_occupancy_divisor' (2) was used instead of 'first_class_people' (3).
